name: UPnP IGD Controller for Linux
short_description: UPnP IGD Controller implementation. Allow to create/destroy portmappings on a UPnP IGD Device, get its external IP, and a lot of other features defined by UPnP standards. The library and client example are well suited for low memory/disk space systems.
